/icons/analytics/00039-icon-service-Even.description: Process large-scale real-time data streaming and event ingestion

/icons/analytics/00042-icon-service-Stre.name: Stream Analytics Jobs
/icons/analytics/00042-icon-service-Stre.description: Real-time analytics on streaming data from devices and applications

/icons/analytics/00562-icon-service-Endp.name: Endpoint Analytics
/icons/analytics/00562-icon-service-Endp.description: Analyzes traffic to understand user behavior, detect anomalies, and improve application performance

/icons/analytics/00606-icon-service-Azur.name: Azure Synapse Analytics
/icons/analytics/00606-icon-service-Azur.description: Cloud-based enterprise data warehousing, big data analytics, and data integration solution

/icons/analytics/02189-icon-service-Azur.description: Azure Workbooks enables users to create customized, interactive reports and dashboards for monitoring and analyzing cloud-based resources

/icons/analytics/02209-icon-service-Priv.name: Private Link Services
/icons/analytics/02209-icon-service-Priv.description: Private Link Services enables private connectivity to Azure services from on-premises networks, without exposing them publicly.

/icons/analytics/03332-icon-service-Powe.name: Power BI Embedded
/icons/analytics/03332-icon-service-Powe.description: Embed Power BI reports and dashboards into web applications, mobile apps, or IoT devices

/icons/analytics/03335-icon-service-Powe.description: A low-code platform for building custom business applications, automating workflows, and analyzing data.

/icons/analytics/10126-icon-service-Data.name: Data Factories
/icons/analytics/10126-icon-service-Data.description: Azure Data Factory (ADF) is a cloud-based data integration service that helps you to create, deploy, and manage scalable data pipelines for processing and moving large datasets between various sources and sinks.

/icons/analytics/10142-icon-service-HD-I.name: HD Insight Clusters
/icons/analytics/10142-icon-service-HD-I.description: HDInsight Clusters is a fully managed, open-source analytics service that enables you to process and analyze large datasets using popular frameworks such as Hadoop, Spark, Hive, Pig, and more

/icons/analytics/10143-icon-service-Data.name: Data Lake Analytics
/icons/analytics/10143-icon-service-Data.description: Scales and processes large amounts of data in Azure Data Lake Storage using SQL, Python, or .NET.

/icons/analytics/10145-icon-service-Azur.name: Azure Data Explorer Clusters
/icons/analytics/10145-icon-service-Azur.description: Azure Data Explorer (Kusto) Clusters enable scalable, cloud-based analytics for log and IoT data

/icons/analytics/10148-icon-service-Anal.name: Analysis Services
/icons/analytics/10148-icon-service-Anal.description: Cloud-based enterprise BI platform for analyzing and visualizing large datasets

/icons/analytics/10149-icon-service-Even.name: Event Hub Clusters
/icons/analytics/10149-icon-service-Even.description: Process large volumes of events in real-time across multiple Event Hubs

/icons/analytics/10150-icon-service-Data.name: Data Lake Store Gen1
/icons/analytics/10150-icon-service-Data.description: A scalable, cloud-based repository for storing and processing large amounts of structured and unstructured data.

/icons/analytics/10787-icon-service-Azur.name: Azure Databricks
/icons/analytics/10787-icon-service-Azur.description: A fast, easy-to-use analytics platform that enables data engineers, analysts, and scientists to work together seamlessly on large-scale data sets using Apache Spark
